description:
Sweet, crunchy, and just the right amount of toasty. Whittaker’s Hokey Pokey Crunch takes their creamy 33% milk chocolate and fills it with crumbles of honeycomb.

  • Ingredients: milk chocolate [sugar, cocoa solids+ 33%* (cocoa butter+ & cocoa mass+), NZ milk powder 30%*, emulsifier (soy lecithin), vanilla flavour]; hokey pokey pieces 15% [sugar, glucose, water, sodium bicarbonate, hydrolysed milk protein, salt]. *minimum percentage
  • Allergens, contains: milk, may contain: peanuts, tree nuts, and gluten
  • A family legacy, Whittaker’s is New Zealand’s finest chocolate and has been since 1896
  • Based on rich Ghanian cocoa pods that are sun-dried to perfection before processing in small batches in Porirua New Zealand
  • Rainforest alliance certified
name: Whittaker's Hokey Pokey Crunch Slab
